faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions

q1.question: Can I use the system without internet?
q1.answer: Yes, Zaytuna works fully offline with automatic synchronization when connected to the internet.

q2.question: How many branches can I manage?
q2.answer: You can manage unlimited branches and warehouses from one account.

q3.question: Do I need training to use the system?
q3.answer: No, Zaytuna's interface is intuitive and easy to use. We also provide full technical support to help you.

q4.question: What payment methods are available?
q4.answer: We accept cash, credit cards, e-wallets, and deferred payment.

q5.question: Is my data secure?
q5.answer: Yes, we use the latest encryption and security technologies to protect your data. We also provide automatic backups.

q6.question: How can I get technical support?
q6.answer: You can contact us via email, phone, or live chat. Our team is ready to help you 24/7.
